summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling resolutions 1044 (1996), 1054 (1996) and 1070 (1996), 
Noting steps taken by Sudan to comply with resolutions 1044 (1996) and 1070 (1996), 
Noting communications from the Non-aligned Movement, League of Arab States, African Group, Organization of African Unity, Ethiopia, and Egypt, 
Welcoming Sudan's accession to international conventions on terrorism elimination, 
Acting under Chapter VII of the UN Charter,
Decides to terminate, with immediate effect, measures referred to in resolutions 1054 (1996) and 1070 (1996).
